description: Black Gold Saw has fallen before the might of Black Rock Shooter, but now the battle between Shooter and Strength begins. It isn’t long, though, before the berserk Black Rock Shooter also has Strength on the ropes with her overwhelming power. Meanwhile, in the world Mato once knew as reality, Yu can see what’s happening in the other world. Saya tells her that the source of Black Rock Shooter`s incredible strength is connected to Mato`s true nature. In order to save Mato, Yu resolves to take a desperate measure.

titles.title: Eine Hoffnung, die durch die Finsternis zu den Sternen emporsteigt
Make a Wish on a Star Racing Through the Darkness
Yami o Kakeru Hoshi ni Negai o
闇を駆ける星に願いを
